ticket.title: [PATCH] Routing Mapper with % interpolation broken on Ruby 1.9.1

version.body:
(from [afdf52402ea7cb153be54a342f0e6502a159e327]) Routing Mapper with % interpolation on Ruby 1.9.1 fixed [#3837 status:resolved]
Signed-off-by: José Valim <jose.valim@gmail.com> http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/afdf52402ea7cb153be54a342f0e6502a159e327
